title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate 3/17 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




March 17, 2009

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate 3/17




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secrectary  ________________________________________________  For Immediate Release  March 17, 2009 NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:  David F. Hamilton, of Indiana, to be United States Circuit Judge for the Seventh Circuit, vice Kenneth F. Ripple, retired.
